name: Blade Runner
description:
This script will install "Blade Runner" GOG edition for ScummVM.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.gog: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
custom-name: Blade Runner - GOG - ScummVM
files:
- gog: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  game_id: bladerunner
  path: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
  subtitles: true
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/BR/
    format: zip
    src: gog
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $CACHE/BR/data/noarch/game/data/
scummvm:
  fullscreen: true
